resources.string: You can\'t reset my password, you are a monkey!
Pebble Locker has been enabled, you must now set a password
Pebble Locker has been disabled, your password has been cleared
Your password has been removed and Pebble Locker has been disabled
You have just reset your lock screen password to \"%1$s\""
This option requires the premium version of the app, press Ok to purchase
In app purchases are still loading, please try again in a minute. If this problem persists, please contact the developer
In app purchases are not possible at this time, please try again later. If this problem persists, please contact the developer.
There was an error completing your purchase, please try again later. If this problem persists, please contact the developer.
Control the lock state from your Pebble watch. Options include automatic, locked and unlocked
Select other bluetooth devices that will also unlock your device
Select WiFi networks that will unlock your device
If you are having problems, click here to contact the developer
